═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
                    FLASHBACK: 10 YEARS AGO
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

The smoke is thick. Acrid. You're younger—so much younger.

The screams are real. They echo in your skull even now.

You see the faces in the windows. Pressed against the glass. Hands pounding. The flames climbing higher.

You could have—

No. You didn't. You couldn't have.

The fire chief pulls you back. "Nothing we can do," he says.

But you weren't trying to go in.

You were just... watching.

...Weren't you?

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
